name: Solar System (itch) (MichaelMXY)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added the following elements:

1. Added ALL the Planets

2. Background Music-- Cornfield Chase（background music of Interstellar)

3. Ring of Saturn

4. Improved the light & the trail of the comets

5. Improved all planets' rotation speed
